column5: All the time
Me too ! Thought everyone does this & people think I'm hiding stuff because I always clean & clear things up.
Yes , & that's my point exactly & he thinks I'm mad because of that & he gets defensive
We've been together 9 months going on 10. He's known her the same time , but they aren't even really friends. Just roommates
He's known her the same amount of time I've known her , they're roommates & he didn't invite me because they didn't invite me.
He said he didn't know me well enough at the time
I keep actually breaking up with my so too. I think he's getting fed up but something in me keeps breaking Everytime I get jealous or argue with him.
